data.name: -RAINBOW Kata - Broken
data.description:
You lie on your deathbed - a millionaire with no heir to your fortune, your life's work incomplete. As the doctors rush in, you feel your life-force slowly ebbing away, and [you begin to dictate your epitaph](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pIo6yHc7_Sc). ![alt text](http://i.imgur.com/FnHCw.jpg "Rainbow Burns")

Your task

Given a random string of letters, create a function that will determine if the string contains all the letters necessary to construct the seven colours of the rainbow: **Red, Orange, Yellow, Green, Blue, Indigo, Violet.** If the string does not contain the necessary letters, return ```"Smithers, I am not going to make it..."``` If the string does contain the necessary letters, return ```"Oh, Tyrant! Hear his mighty name and quake!"```

Examples

```REDORANGEYELLOWGREENBLUEINDIGOVIOLET``` should pass (it contains the letters for all seven of the colours) ```EDORANGEYELLOWGREENBLUEINDIGOVIOLET``` should not pass (it only contains two R's, so does not contain all the necessary characters) ```EDGRSHJOFVEXECMIXEZIQEOHPEUBOLGNSNAROHZWYRZGSCNQTEDLQL``` should pass (it contains the letters for all seven of the colours, randomly organised among other letters)

Note

The letters will all be in uppercase. The letters will be in random order. The string length can vary but will not exceed 70 characters.
